name: RollingSoccer
description:
In Rolling Soccer you have to roll the ball collecting objects before heading to the goal, the bigger you make the ball the more points you'll score. A mix of Katamari and well, soccer.

 You can play alone or against a friend!

Controls for player 1:

 Arrow keys - movement

 Space or right ctrl - kick the ball if you have it or slide to steal the ball
 
 You can also use a pad if you have one

Controls for player 2:

 wasd keys - movement

 left ctrl or T  - kick / slide
